703581f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clarkson Avenue - Bedford Avenue
703581f-a.text:
111 Clarkson Ave., north side, just east of Bedford Ave., showing the
H. Raub house ereoted in 1904. H. Raub was the proprietor of Raub's
Restaurant on Nevins Street and Flatbush Ave., and the President of the
Consumers Park Brewing Company.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Collection.
MAY BI RDPRODUCED.
703581f-a.folder: Clarkson Avenue & Bedford Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703582f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clarkson Avenue - Bedford Avenue
703582f-a.text:
165 Clarkson Ave., north side, between Bedford and Rogers Aves.,
showing a house about 100 years old, being part of the William B. Farrell
estate. Mr. Farrell had purchased it from Mr. Patrick Mullen, gunmnaker.
This house has been torn down, before 1936.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
